verses.verse: מִ֚י <WH4310> Who כְּהֶ֣חָכָ֔ם <WH2450> Who [is] as the wise וּמִ֥י <WH4310> and who יוֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> [man]? and who knoweth פֵּ֣שֶׁר <WH6592> the interpretation דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> act חָכְמַ֤ת <WH2451> wisdom אָדָם֙ <WH120> man תָּאִ֣יר <WH215> to shine פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> maketh his face וְעֹ֥ז <WH5797> and the boldness פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> of his face יְשֻׁנֶּֽא׃ <WH8132> shall be changed

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I פִּי־ <WH6310> commandment מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's שְׁמ֔וֹר <WH8104> I [counsel thee] to keep וְעַ֕ל <WH5921> and in דִּבְרַ֖ת <WH1700> and [that] in regard שְׁבוּעַ֥ת <WH7621> of the oath אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבָּהֵ֤ל <WH926> Be not hasty מִפָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> of his sight תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> along אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> stand בְּדָבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing רָ֑ע <WH7451> not in an evil כִּ֛י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he יַחְפֹּ֖ץ <WH2654> whatsoever pleaseth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> for he doeth

בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Since דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Where the word מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of a king שִׁלְט֑וֹן <WH7983> [is there is] power וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who יֹֽאמַר־ <WH559> and who may say ל֖וֹ מַֽה־ <WH4100> What תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto him What doest

שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> Whoso keepeth מִצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> the commandment לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> shall feel דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> thing רָ֑ע <WH7451> no evil וְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> both time וּמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> and judgment יֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> discerneth לֵ֥ב <WH3820> heart חָכָֽם׃ <WH2450> and a wise man's

כִּ֣י <WH3588> though לְכָל־ <WH3605> every חֵ֔פֶץ <WH2656> Because to every purpose יֵ֖שׁ <WH3426> there is עֵ֣ת <WH6256> time וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though רָעַ֥ת <WH7451> therefore the misery הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man רַבָּ֥ה <WH7227> [is] great עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> no יֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> For he knoweth מַה־ <WH4100> what שֶּׁיִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> will happen כִּ֚י <WH3588> If כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will happen מִ֖י <WH4310> who יַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> not that which shall be for who can tell לֽוֹ׃

אֵ֣ין <WH369> No אָדָ֞ם <WH120> [There is] no man שַׁלִּ֤יט <WH7989> that hath power בָּר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> over the spirit לִכְל֣וֹא <WH3607> to retain אֶת־ <WH853> הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit וְאֵ֤ין <WH369> and there שִׁלְטוֹן֙ <WH7983> neither [hath he] power בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day הַמָּ֔וֶת <WH4194> of death וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> is no מִשְׁלַ֖חַת <WH4917> and [there is] no discharge בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> in [that] war וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יְמַלֵּ֥ט <WH4422> deliver רֶ֖שַׁע <WH7562> neither shall wickedness אֶת־ <WH853> בְּעָלָֽיו׃ <WH1167> those that are given אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner

זֶ֤ה <WH2088> this רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> All this have I seen וְנָת֣וֹן <WH5414> and applied אֶת־ <WH853> לִבִּ֔י <WH3820> my heart לְכָֽל־ <WH3605> All מַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> unto every work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> wherein נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that is done תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun עֵ֗ת <WH6256> [there is] a time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> wherein שָׁלַ֧ט <WH7980> ruleth הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> wherein one man בְּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> over man לְרַ֥ע <WH7451> over another to his own hurt לֽוֹ׃

וּבְכֵ֡ן <WH3651> And so רָאִיתִי֩ <WH7200> I saw רְשָׁעִ֨ים <WH7563> the wicked קְבֻרִ֜ים <WH6912> buried וָבָ֗אוּ <WH935> who had come וּמִמְּק֤וֹם <WH4725> from the place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> of the holy יְהַלֵּ֔כוּ <WH1980> and gone וְיִֽשְׁתַּכְּח֥וּ <WH7911> and they were forgotten בָעִ֖יר <WH5892> in the city אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where כֵּן־ <WH3651> thus עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> where they had so done גַּם־ <WH1571> too זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> this [is] also vanity

אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> Because אֵין־ <WH369> is not נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> is not executed פִתְגָ֔ם <WH6599> Because sentence מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> work הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> against an evil מְהֵרָ֑ה <WH4120> speedily עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> after that מָלֵ֞א <WH4390> is fully set לֵ֧ב <WH3820> therefore the heart בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> of men בָּהֶ֖ם לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> in them to do רָֽע׃ <WH7451> evil

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Although חֹטֶ֗א <WH2398> Though a sinner עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> do רָ֛ע <WH7451> evil מְאַ֖ת <WH3967> an hundred times וּמַאֲרִ֣יךְ <WH748> and his [days] be prolonged ל֑וֹ כִּ֚י <WH3588> for גַּם־ <WH1571> again יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> yet surely I know אָ֔נִי <WH589> I אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become טּוֹב֙ <WH2896> that it shall be well לְיִרְאֵ֣י <WH3372> which fear הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> fear מִלְּפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְטוֹב֙ <WH2896> But it shall not be well לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָֽרָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> with the wicked וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and he will not יַאֲרִ֥יךְ <WH748> neither shall he prolong יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> [his] days כַּצֵּ֑ל <WH6738> [which are] as a shadow אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> because אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> else יָרֵ֖א <WH3373> because he feareth מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> not before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> There is הֶבֶל֮ <WH1892> a vanity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> which is done עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> upon the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> to whom יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> again there be צַדִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> that there be just אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which מַגִּ֤יעַ <WH5060> [men] unto whom it happeneth אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> according to the work הָרְשָׁעִ֔ים <WH7563> of the wicked וְיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> there רְשָׁעִ֔ים <WH7563> wicked שֶׁמַּגִּ֥יעַ <WH5060> [men] to whom it happeneth אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> about כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> according to the work הַצַּדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> of the righteous אָמַ֕רְתִּי <WH559> I said שֶׁגַּם־ <WH1571> that this also זֶ֖ה <WH2088> this הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> [is] vanity

וְשִׁבַּ֤חְתִּֽי <WH7623> Then I commended אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> mirth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אֵֽין־ <WH369> there ט֤וֹב <WH2896> hath no better thing לָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> because a man תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo לֶאֱכ֥וֹל <WH398> than to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> and to drink וְלִשְׂמ֑וֹחַ <WH8055> and to be merry וְה֞וּא <WH1931> and this יִלְוֶ֣נּוּ <WH3867> for that shall abide בַעֲמָל֗וֹ <WH5999> with him of his labour יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> the days חַיָּ֛יו <WH2416> of his life אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> giveth ל֥וֹ הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> which God תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> him under the sun

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> When I applied אֶת־ <WH853> לִבִּי֙ <WH3820> mine heart לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> to know חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> wisdom וְלִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> and to see אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עִנְיָ֔ן <WH6045> the business אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that is done עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth כִּ֣י <WH3588> though גַ֤ם <WH1571> בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> (for also [there is that] neither day וּבַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> nor night שֵׁנָ֕ה <WH8142> sleep בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> affliction אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> one רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> seeth

וְרָאִיתִי֮ <WH7200> Then I beheld אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> all the work הָאֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> of God כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> not יוּכַ֜ל <WH3201> cannot הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> that a man לִמְצוֹא֙ <WH4672> find out אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH4639> the work אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> because נַעֲשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> that is done תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> under the sun בְּ֠שֶׁל <WH7945> though אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַעֲמֹ֧ל <WH5998> labour הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> a man לְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> to seek [it] out וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> he will not יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> yet he shall not find וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> again אִם־ <WH518> and though יֹאמַ֤ר <WH559> [man] think הֶֽחָכָם֙ <WH2450> [it] yea further though a wise לָדַ֔עַת <WH3045> to know לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall he יוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> [it] yet shall he not be able לִמְצֹֽא׃ <WH4672> to find
